triples.name: Object graph
triples.relevance: The paper builds on object graph concepts to create its in-memory storage model.

triples.name: Graph database
triples.relevance: εStore implements a stripped-down version of graph database functionality for in-memory object graphs.

triples.name: Cypher (query language)
triples.relevance: The paper uses a subset of Cypher query language to query the graph store.

triples.name: Query language
triples.relevance: The paper uses query language concepts to enable querying of the in-memory object graph.

triples.name: Java (programming language)
triples.relevance: εStore is implemented in Java with compile-time query rewriting for runtime performance.

triples.name: In-memory database
triples.relevance: The paper proposes εStore as an in-memory object graph store with novel storage and querying capabilities.
